summary: Build "Placement Prep Tracker" for Tier-2/3 college students preparing for campus placements, focused on behavior-based daily tracking, readiness scoring, weak-area detection, mock-test analytics, and a guidance dashboard.
architectural_notes: Core principle: track user behavior (study logs, consistency) not just content consumption.
Primary entities: User, Topic, StudyLog, MockTest, MockAttempt, WeakArea.
Readiness algorithm baseline: readiness = 0.4*consistency + 0.4*accuracy + 0.2*coverage using recent study logs, mock accuracy, topic weights, and consistency.
Tech stack target: React/Next.js frontend; Node (Express) or Django backend; PostgreSQL DB; JWT auth; deploy to Railway/Render/Vercel.
Non-functional targets: mobile-first UX, <500ms response time target, data retention 1 year, initial DAU target ~200.

new_feature_requests.summary: Student onboarding: graduation year, branch, target companies selection
Daily tracking: study log (topic, time spent, confidence), streak counter
Readiness engine: compute readiness score (0-100), detect weak areas, predict exam readiness
Mock tests: record attempts, accuracy analytics, company-wise performance
Dashboard: daily plan suggestions, progress graphs, weak-topic alerts
